name: PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, BUREAU OF LIQUOR CONTROL ENFORCEMENT, Appellant, v. HOSPITALITY INVESTMENTS OF SOCIETY HILL, INC., Appellee
name_abbreviation: Pennsylvania State Police v. Hospitality Investments of Society Hill, Inc.
docket_number: Appeal No. 1 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1993

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, BUREAU OF LIQUOR CONTROL ENFORCEMENT, Appellant, v. HOSPITALITY INVESTMENTS OF SOCIETY HILL, INC., Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County is REVERSED. See, Pennsylvania State Police, Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement v. Hospitality Investments of Philadelphia, Inc., 539 Pa. 108, 650 A.2d 854 (1994).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

opinions.text:
FLAHERTY, Justice,
dissenting.
I dissent based on my dissenting opinion filed in Pennsylvania State Police, Bureau of Liquor Control Enforcement, v. Hospitality Investments of Philadelphia, Inc., 539 Pa. 108, 650 A.2d 854.
opinions.author: FLAHERTY, Justice,

opinions.text:
CASTILLE, Justice,
dissenting.
I respectfully dissent based on my dissenting opinion filed in Pennsylvania State Police, Bureau of Liquor Control En forcement v. Hospitality Investments of Philadelphia, Inc., 539 Pa. 108, 650 A.2d 854.
opinions.author: CASTILLE, Justice,

attorneys: Stanley J. Wolowski, Pittsburgh, for Pennsylvania State Police.
Gary F. DiVito, Philadelphia, for Hospitality Investments.
casebody.head_matter:
650 A.2d 863
PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, BUREAU OF LIQUOR CONTROL ENFORCEMENT, Appellant, v. HOSPITALITY INVESTMENTS OF SOCIETY HILL, INC., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 18, 1993.
Decided Nov. 3, 1994.
Stanley J. Wolowski, Pittsburgh, for Pennsylvania State Police.
Gary F. DiVito, Philadelphia, for Hospitality Investments.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
